A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is the worst Star Wars movie by a long way. trivialises and cheapens the force as a concept. treats the iconic character of luke skywalker appallingly for no reason other than to destroy this iconic archetypal male character and to lessen the inspiring quality of his hero's journey in the OT. this is post modern nihilistic garbage hiding behind some pretty cgi and social justice nonsense. i could go on but its all been said many times already. don't waste your money on the dvd when it's released.
